name: DefendYou
description:
Hi! This is a new game that I made. In this game you need to throw the same projectiles as the enemy does so you can defend you.

Controls:

A - throws circle projectiles

S - throws square projectiles

D - throws triangular projectiles

Please download and if you like this game, don't forget to tell about this game to your friends.

To see how this game was made go to my channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5UN-bX1VUPPSQamyNukZJA
